componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},

I would like to take a moment to introduce our Pharmaceutical Expert, Lori Bitar, who will be staffing booth #1311 at Labelexpo Americas 2022 in Chicago from September 13th to the 15th. She will be available to discuss our PHARMcal product line (below) and discuss pain points and solutions.

We invite you to stop by and have a conversation with our Pharmaceutical, Packaging and Durables in-house experts. If you are not attending the show, please feel free to connect with them.

{{{Sender.Signature}}}

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Lori Bitar - Market Development Manager; Pharmaceutical

Lori is the Market Development Manager for the Pharmaceutical market. Lori is a Market Development Manager and sits as the Chair of AIM North America's Pharma Working Group. She has extensive knowledge in print technologies and product performance in the labeling sector. Lori is ready to share her knowledge to ensure the success of your pharmaceutical and medical device labeling applications.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: A Pharmcal product for every application

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
PHARMcal Brochure
Our NEW PHARMcal brochure includes info on these products and applications!

Product families & applications include
PHARMcal® SUPREME for vials, syringes, and ampules
PHARMcal® OTC for over-the-counter drug labeling
PHARMcal® CONCEAL™ for covering existing labels
PHARMcal® CryoFLEX™ for extreme storage conditions
PHARMcal® TAMPERmark™ for security and counterfeit protection
PHARMcal® BIOmark for asset tracking of blood materials.
